title: T206 Chase dark cap for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Chase dark cap for sale
posts.post_content: T206 Hal Chase Throwing, dark pose for sale. $250.00 delivered Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. Please reserve via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" trumps requests for additional scans or discounts. First come, first served. Larger scans available on my updated website below. Thank you for looking.
